Dear all,


due to the summer break and the late registration we are a little behind
schedule regarding the workshop outline. We are still looking for some
presentation for the workshop.
Below you find the preliminary schedule for the first two workshop days.
For the Wednesday (the course advanced fenestration) I will send out the
preliminary schedule in the next days as soon as I have all the feedback.


Best regards,


Jan + Sandra
